summary: This document consists of email correspondence related to a subpoena issued by the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding a real estate transaction involving Granite Reality LLC. The emails discuss the provision of documents and due diligence related to the property, as well as communication between attorneys and the SDNY.

persons.name: Jen Marshal
persons.context: Jen Marshal is mentioned as a contact involved in the real estate transaction related to Granite Reality LLC.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is mentioned as a contact involved in the real estate transaction related to Granite Reality LLC.

persons.name: Attorney at Law
persons.context: An unnamed attorney is involved in handling title and settlement services for the property transaction and is communicating with the SDNY.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is coordinating the subpoena and requesting documents related to the real estate transaction.

connections.description: Jen and Steve Marshal are mentioned together as contacts involved in the real estate transaction.
The attorney is providing information and documents to the Assistant United States Attorney in relation to the subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued by the SDNY seeking non-privileged materials regarding the purchase of a property.

keyFacts: The email correspondence discusses a subpoena related to a real estate transaction involving Granite Reality LLC.
Jen and Steve Marshal are identified as contacts for the transaction.
The attorney is tasked with handling title and settlement services and conducting due diligence on the property.
The Assistant United States Attorney is actively seeking documents related to the transaction.
There is a correction noted regarding the name of the entity involved in the transaction, clarifying it as Granite Reality LLC.
